history.string: add policy edmTaskTrace
mod policy edmTaskTrace add type IMS_TaskTrace
mod policy edmTaskTrace add type 'Task Management'
mod policy edmTaskTrace store STORE
mod policy edmTaskTrace add allstate public none none owner none none

mod policy edmTaskTrace allstate revoke public none none filter '' remove revoke public all all revoke owner none none filter '' remove revoke owner all all public none none filter '' remove public all all owner none none filter '' remove owner all all
